parameters.description: Direction reference type as defined in swSelectType_e

title: IMoveFaceFeatureData.GetDirectionReference
description: Gets the direction reference for this Move Face feature.

parameters.name: DirRefType
parameters.description: Direction reference type as defined in swSelectType_e

returns: Direction reference: If a translated, then a plane , planar face , linear edge , or reference axis If rotated, then a linear edge or reference axis

examples.title: Change Direction Reference of Move Face Feature (VBA)
